summary: Successfully implemented dynamic URL fields functionality in SearchScreen. Replaced the single static URL input with an intelligent dynamic system that auto-generates new fields when the current one is filled, includes individual field clearing/removal capabilities, real-time URL validation with visual feedback, clickable URL previews, smart placeholder text, and a progress counter. The system maintains at least one field at all times and provides smooth UX with hover-based action buttons and proper keyboard navigation.
current_status: The search screen now provides seamless multi-URL input capability with automatic field generation and comprehensive field management. Combined with all previous features (enrichment with manual editing and confirmation, dynamic column suggestions, CSV parsing, link processing, second iteration workflow, Telegram integration, and newsletter subscription), the application offers a complete and user-friendly market intelligence platform with professional data input and validation capabilities.
